title: Ep. 890 - The Only Rule The Left Cares About
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, a recent CNN article compares Joe Rogan’s use of the N-word to January 6th — and January 6th as we know, according to the Left, was as bad as 9-11. This may all seem very stupid on the surface — and it is stupid — but there’s something deeper going on here, which we’ll talk about today. Also, a new euphemism for rioters just dropped. It’s the best one of all. The ATF essentially encourages us to make false reports against our enemies for revenge. And a model says that she "don't need no man" because she's in love with herself. Will "autosexuals" now be welcomed into the LGBT alphabet camp? 
I am now a self-acclaimed beloved children’s author. Reserve your copy of my new book here: https://utm.io/ud1Cb 
The world’s best-selling LGBT author (me) now has his own merch line: https://utm.io/uedoZ
You petitioned, and we heard you. Made for Sweet Babies everywhere: get the official Sweet Baby Gang t-shirt here: https://utm.io/udIX3
Subscribe to The Daily Wire and stream our newest movie SHUT IN, already with a 100% critic score and a 97% audience score on Rotten Tomatoes: https://utm.io/uehf3
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

Today on the Matt Walsh Show, a recent CNN article compares Joe Rogan’s use of the N-word to January 6th — and January 6th as we know, according to the Left, was as bad as 9-11. This may all seem very stupid on the surface — and it is stupid — but there’s something deeper going on here, which we’ll talk about today. Also, a new euphemism for rioters just dropped. It’s the best one of all. The ATF essentially encourages us to make false reports against our enemies for revenge. And a model says that she "don't need no man" because she's in love with herself. Will "autosexuals" now be welcomed into the LGBT alphabet camp?
